definition: Pingshan county in Yibin 宜賓|宜宾[Yi2 bin1], Sichuan
(standing) screen
see 屏營|屏营[bing1 ying2]
to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Pingshan county in Yibin 宜賓|宜宾[Yi2 bin1], Sichuan

sentences.english: Next stop is Ping Shan. The end of Zone 4 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系屏山，單程車票第四收費區終止。

sentences.english: Next stop is Ping Shan, Zone 4 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系屏山，屬單程車票第四收費區。

sentences.english: We've seen the Yangzi River by going to the Cuiping Mountain top . How grand it is .
sentences.chinese: 我們在翠屏山上看見了長江，長江是多麼的雄偉。

sentences.english: Designated counseling and testing points are located at City Road in Ping Shan by tuberculosis control.
sentences.chinese: 指定的諮詢檢測點設在屏山大道柳州市結核病防治所。
